extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by verifying the installed firmware version and configurations against the affected product list.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is updating to the latest firmware version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware to Secure Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the firmware to the secure version as recommended by WAGO for the specific device series.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device and ensure it is not directly connected to the internet as a temporary mitigation measure.
